data.text: My first introduction to beauty

data.text: what you have, not hiding what you have."

data.text: Check out her beauty website, Rose Inc.

translation.text: Kiểm tra trang web làm đẹp của cô ấy, Rose Inc.

title: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley Pranked Jimmy with a Selfie at the Met Gala
